findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The mint function allows the owner to mint an unlimited number of sundae tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The smart contract may allow unauthorized upgrades to its scripts.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function is public and does not have any access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected delegates function
findings.description: The delegates function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it accessible to anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected delegate function
findings.description: The delegate function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it accessible by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected delegateBySig function
findings.description: The delegateBySig function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected getCurrentVotes function
findings.description: The getCurrentVotes function is declared as External and lacks access control modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected getPriorVotes function
findings.description: The getPriorVotes function is declared as external and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected _delegate function
findings.description: The internal function _delegate is unprotected and can be accessed by anyone, potentially leading to unauthorized delegation.

findings.title: Unprotected _moveDelegates function
findings.description: The internal function _moveDelegates lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to manipulate delegate assignments.

findings.title: Unprotected _writeCheckpoint function
findings.description: The internal function _writeCheckpoint lacks access control and can be exploited by unauthorized users.
